General.Name: CSPC Innovation Pharmaceutical Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: CSPC Innovation Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells caffeine, and vitamin C health supplement and beverage products. The company is based in Shijiazhuang, China. CSPC Innovation Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of CSPC Pharmaceutical Group Limited.
General.Address: No. 36, Fuqiang Western Road, Shijiazhuang, China, 051430
